original_title: Time given to correct errors of O/L admission cards ending today (24)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st)  – The Department of Examinations informs that if there is any error in the admission card given to the students to appear for the 2022 GCE Ordinary Level examination, the time given to correct it will end at midnight today (24).
Commissioner General of Examinations, Amit Jayasundara, mentioned this while joining the Negitimu Sri Lanka program which aired on TV1 this morning.
The 2022 GCE Ordinary Level Examination will be held from 29th of May to the 8th June.
